short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find senior discounts automatically at over 250 popular retailers and services providers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Senior Discount Finder is an extension that automatically notifies you of exclusive senior discounts at over 250 popular retailers and service providers in USA, UK and Canada.

Whether you need to rent a car for you next trip or buy that new gen laptop, Senior Discount Finder will let you know of exclusive senior discounts as you shop online or browse google.

All you have to do is just click on the notification when it appears and follow the verification process or copy/paste the senior discount code shown to qualify for the offer.
